lead_paragraph: Trevor Bauer had hoped to pitch a bloody good game. Instead, he had trouble finding the plate and his pitch count rose rapidly.

headline.print_headline: Bauer Beaten by Cubs Instead of Bloodied by Drone
headline.main: Bauer Beaten by Cubs Instead of Bloodied by Drone

snippet: Trevor Bauer had hoped to pitch a bloody good game. Instead, he had trouble finding the plate and his pitch count rose rapidly....
